were playing in the garden when a large arm appeared from the clouds. The arm reached down from the sky and gave them a big surprise. The brothers were amazed and thanked the arm for the wonderful surprise. 
One brother asked, "What do we do with it?"
The arm replied, "You must share it together."
The brothers smiled and thanked the arm again. They shared the surprise together and had lots of fun. They were so happy that they thanked the arm every day for the wonderful surprise.

called Primrose. She lay in the sun, happily playing with a ball of yarn. A mysterious figure approached her, wearing a long cloak and a tall hat.

Primrose was afraid and stayed very still. “Who… who are you?” she asked.
The figure smiled and said, “I am your guardian angel. Do you know what that means?”
Primrose shook her head. “No…”

When she woke up, she saw something on her hand. It was the yellow butterfly! It had landed on her while she was sleeping. It was still and quiet. Lila was very happy and surprised. She gently touched its wing with her finger. It felt soft and tickly.

saw a new animal outside the barn. It was a little duck. The duck said, "Hi, I am Ducky. Can I play with you?" Molly said, "Yes, you can play with us. You belong with us in the barn."
Molly and Ducky had a lot of fun playing in the barn with their friends. They laughed and played all day long. And from that day on, Ducky knew that he belonged in the big red barn with his funny friend Molly the cow.

a soft voice. "Hello, I am a kind spirit," the voice said. Tom looked around and saw a little glowing light. The spirit was friendly and wanted to help Tom clean the house.
Together, Tom and the kind spirit cleaned the whole house. They laughed and talked while they worked. When the house was all clean, the spirit said, "Thank you, Tom. You are a good friend." Tom smiled and said, "Thank you too, kind spirit. We made the house look nice!"

gentle voice. "Hello! I'm Albert, the talking eraser," it said. Peanut couldn't believe her eyes.
Peanut asked Albert what he did. Albert replied, "I erase things but I also like to talk!" 
Peanut was so excited. She smiled and nodded her head. She had never seen anything like Albert before! 
From that moment on, Albert and Peanut became the best of friends. They were always curious, exploring what was around them together.

saw something that made him gasp. It was his bicycle! The truck had his bicycle on the back, along with other things. Timmy realized that he had left his bicycle outside the park gate, and someone had taken it and put it on the truck.
Timmy ran after the truck, but it was too fast. He shouted and cried, but no one heard him. He lost his bicycle, his original bicycle, and he didn't know what to do. He felt very sad and angry.
He walked back to his house, with tears in his eyes. He didn't want to see his mom or his surprise.

hill, but she couldn’t make it over the edge. She was about to give up, when she heard the rabbit's voice. "If you keep trying, you can finish!”

day, a rare voice was heard in the forest. All the birds stopped what they were doing and looked around, until they noticed a small bird hovering in the air.
